attributes.name: Sales by Business Area and Package
attributes.description: A detail list contains sales information per business area and package along with a sales comparison on different sales periods
attributes.physicalFileName: Sales by Business Area and Product

attributes.name: Sales by Sales Channel and Sales Assistant
attributes.description: A detail list contains sales information per associated sales channel and the sales assistant along with a sales comparison on given sales periods
attributes.physicalFileName: Sales by Sales Channel and Employee

attributes.name: Gross Profit
attributes.description: Current sales and profitability based on Estimated GP

attributes.name: Gross Profit Estimated Vs Actual
attributes.description: Spot diferrence between Estimated and Actual GP

attributes.name: Stock Requirements - Deliverables
attributes.description: Check what needs to be ordered for an event and what has already beed ordered

attributes.name: Aged Debtors
attributes.description: A list of all trade debtors at a specific date analysed by length of time that they have been due

attributes.name: Catering
attributes.description: Plan menues and be aware of the special requirements by the catering staff

attributes.name: Table Plan
attributes.description: Get table plan for the customers

attributes.name: Contact
attributes.description: A list contains the contacts with frequent interactions along with some contact information

attributes.name: Payments Received
attributes.description: Used by accountants to reconcile daily takimgs with bank statements

attributes.name: Standard Invoice
attributes.description: Display the Invoice generated for a particular booking

attributes.name: FunctionSheet
attributes.description: Display the Function Sheet (Itinerary and Deliverables[ Tasks and Q&A])

attributes.name: Sales Pipeline
attributes.description: To get an overview of pending sales in the pipeline

attributes.name: Enquiry Conversion
attributes.description: To measure how many enquiries are converted into bookings by different comparisons

attributes.name: Top Clients
attributes.description: A list clients ranked based on the revenue / estimated GP generated

attributes.name: Venue Utilisation
attributes.description: To view which facilities are utilized fully and which are under utilized

attributes.name: Sales by Business Area and Event Date
attributes.description: A detail list contains sales information per business area and event along with a sales comparison on given sales periods
attributes.physicalFileName: Sales by Business Area and Event Date
